MONL.content: power this ‘alien’ [Oedipus] holds over ‘aliens’: innermost secret, sepulture, in exchange for salvation of city, which he refuses his daughters (refuses them a just ‘work of mourning’)
MONL.linkedContent: power this ‘alien’ [Oedipus] holds over ‘aliens’: innermost secret, sepulture, in exchange for salvation of city, which he refuses his daughters (refuses them a just ‘work of mourning’)

H.content: the father-son, the son as father
H.linkedContent: the father-son, the son as father

H.content: Oedipus gives the most poisoned gift, the deprivation of mourning, gives the mourning of mourning, no time of mourning, a respite of infinite time [for Freud, Oedipus’ gift is society]
H.linkedContent: Oedipus gives the most poisoned gift, the deprivation of mourning, gives the mourning of mourning, no time of mourning, a respite of infinite time [for Freud, Oedipus’ gift is society]

H.content: Oedipus conducts his own funeral in secret
H.linkedContent: Oedipus conducts his own funeral in secret

H.content: delay and haste, halting and hastening, rhythm of Oedipus’ journey
H.linkedContent: delay and haste, halting and hastening, rhythm of Oedipus’ journey

H.content: [Oedipus’ dying words] “last time I see lightless light,” Oedipus weeps for tangible light
H.linkedContent: [Oedipus’ dying words] “last time I see lightless light,” Oedipus weeps for tangible light

H.content: [on Oedipus’ final mourning] he’s deprived of something in secrecy [of light?], an encrypting of encrypting, in the crypt the address is cryptic
H.linkedContent: [on Oedipus’ final mourning] he’s deprived of something in secrecy [of light?], an encrypting of encrypting, in the crypt the address is cryptic

H.content: Oedipus is twice encrypted, 1st in dying, 2<sup><small>nd</small></sup> in hiding his death > by demanding he be kept dead, he announces a piece of blackmail
H.linkedContent: Oedipus is twice encrypted, 1st in dying, 2nd in hiding his death > by demanding he be kept dead, he announces a piece of blackmail

H.content: Theseus, with Oedipus’ burial secret, becomes a retained hostage, a detained addressee
H.linkedContent: Theseus, with Oedipus’ burial secret, becomes a retained hostage, a detained addressee

H.content: everyone is hostage to the dead man (Oedipus)
H.linkedContent: everyone is hostage to the dead man (Oedipus)

H.content: Antigone says that Oedipus desired his fate
H.linkedContent: Antigone says that Oedipus desired his fate

PP.content: Oedipus as pharmakos [Derrida distances himself form psychoanalysis]
le père est, le père est (le fils perdu), writing, father is not, suspends question “what is?” which is always “what is the father?”
PP.linkedContent: le père est, le père est (le fils perdu), writing, father is not, suspends question “what is?” which is always “what is the father?”

PPHS.content: Oedipus solves Sphinx’s riddle, beyond hieroglyph > enlightenment, even history

FWT.content: fixed model of oedipal theory in Lacan & Freud > stable father, irreplaceable mother; transformation of family would transform psychoanalysis
FWT.linkedContent: fixed model of oedipal theory in Lacan & Freud > stable father, irreplaceable mother; transformation of family would transform psychoanalysis

DS.content: le double parricide [Plato’s]: Homer (for mimetic poetry), Parmenides (for neglecting mimesis > his logos, the “paternal thesis” would prohibit doubling)
DS.linkedContent: le double parricide [Plato’s]: Homer (for mimetic poetry), Parmenides (for neglecting mimesis > his logos, the “paternal thesis” would prohibit doubling)

SW.content: hand of Oedipus, eye-surgeon, son/inheritor of another eye-surgeon
SW.linkedContent: hand of Oedipus, eye-surgeon, son/inheritor of another eye-surgeon

TR.content: in reference to de Man’s Oedipal analysis of Rousseau, Derrida notes, parenthetically, there are more refined Oedipal schemas
TR.linkedContent: in reference to de Man’s Oedipal analysis of Rousseau, Derrida notes, parenthetically, there are more refined Oedipal schemas

TR.content: is not every footnote a little Oedipal? a symptomatic swelling, a swollen foot (hindering text’s step-by-step advance)?
TR.linkedContent: is not every footnote a little Oedipal? a symptomatic swelling, a swollen foot (hindering text’s step-by-step advance)?

LI.content: to have a general theory of speech act theory: masterpiece of metaphysical-oedipal rhetoric
LI.linkedContent: to have a general theory of speech act theory: masterpiece of metaphysical-oedipal rhetoric

BSi.content: is Derrida just widening the parameters of “fellow”? no, the monstrously other binds me to the nonliving & inscribes concept of death in life  > do we find a comparable obligation to the dead in murder of primal father [Freud]?
BSi.linkedContent: is Derrida just widening the parameters of “fellow”? no, the monstrously other binds me to the nonliving & inscribes concept of death in life > do we find a comparable obligation to the dead in murder of primal father [Freud]?

BSi.content: moral law already there before murder of father because it actualizes after remorse for the murder (not after the murder itself) [i.e. moral law born of remorse, already there]
BSi.linkedContent: moral law already there before murder of father because it actualizes after remorse for the murder (not after the murder itself) [i.e. moral law born of remorse, already there]

BSi.content: Lacan: Oedipus story, a less cretinizing (abêtissant) version of Original Sin > Derrida wonders [coyly] whether everything in BS deals w/ castration
BSi.linkedContent: Lacan: Oedipus story, a less cretinizing (abêtissant) version of Original Sin > Derrida wonders [coyly] whether everything in BS deals w/ castration

SPEC.content: Freud: “super-ego is the heir of the Oedipus complex and represents the ethical standards of mankind”
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud: “super-ego is the heir of the Oedipus complex and represents the ethical standards of mankind”

SPEC.content: all the interlacings of fort:da, tout ce qui s’envoi in graphics of repetition that dislocates summary “triangle” > le trait oedipien n’est qu’une rection pour le fil conducteur de la bobine [Oedipus most narrowly restricted effects of above repetition’s graphics]
SPEC.linkedContent: all the interlacings of fort:da, tout ce qui s’envoi in graphics of repetition that dislocates summary “triangle” > le trait oedipien n’est qu’une rection pour le fil conducteur de la bobine [Oedipus most narrowly restricted effects of above repetition’s graphics]

SPEC.content: as if one were pulling this nebulous matrix, w/ disseminations w/out return, by only one of its string (fils), where matricial mother would be only what she is > for what it means to write oedipally, cf. Glas, which concerns itself w/ only strings/sons (fils), with gash (balafre) and demi-deuil in affectations of proper surname
